@notice The main ecommerce contract to buy and sell ERC-721 tokens representing physical or digital products because we are dealing with non-fungible tokens, there will be only 1 stock per product
 @author Merunas Grincalaitis <merunasgrincalaitis@gmail.com>

nodes.documentation:
@notice To mark an order as completed
 @param _id The id of the order which is the same for the product id
nodes.name: markOrderCompleted
getProduct

params._id: The id of the product to buy
params._lineOneDirection: The first line for the user address
params._lineTwoDirection: The second, optional user address line
params._nameSurname: The name and surname of the buyer
params._phone: The optional phone number for the shipping company
params._postalCode: The postal code of his location
params._stateRegion: The state or region where the buyer lives

params._id: The id of the product to get

getProduct(uint256).return: The product properties including all of them

params._id: The id of the order which is the same for the product id

params._image: The image URL of the product
params._price: The price of the product in ETH

buyProduct(uint256,string,string,string,.notice: To buy a new product, note that the seller must authorize this contract to manage the token

methods.constructor: To setup the address of the ERC-721 token to use for this contract

getProduct(uint256).notice: To get a single product broken down by properties

markOrderCompleted(uint256).notice: To mark an order as completed

publishProduct(string,string,uint256,str.notice: To publish a product as a seller

userdoc.notice: The main ecommerce contract to buy and sell ERC-721 tokens representing physical or digital products because we are dealing with non-fungible tokens, there will be only 1 stock per product
